meanings.definition: A note at the bottom of a page in a book or document.
meanings.sent1: I always check the footnotes at the end of the book for extra information.
meanings.sent2: The footnotes in the research paper provided additional references for the readers.
meanings.sent3: The footnotes in the manual were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: Her life story was like a book with footnotes, revealing the details in small notes.
meanings.sent5: The footnotes acted as a secret code, unlocking the mysteries of the text.

meanings.definition: To add a footnote to a text.
meanings.sent1: She decided to footnotes her essay to give credit to the original authors.
meanings.sent2: Remember to footnotes your research paper to acknowledge your sources.
meanings.sent3: He would often footnotes his emails with funny comments to entertain his friends.
meanings.sent4: The teacher asked the students to footnotes their assignments for proper citation.
meanings.sent5: Adding footnotes to the document made it more informative and credible.
